pullrequest.title: not sure why, but the static_cast call seems to fail with gcc 4.8.2. this incantation is what I saw in a few places on random ogre forums... not sure if it will work in older versions of ogre though.

content.raw:
I would say that it is not really or not only a problem of gcc 4.8.2 but a change in ogre 1.9. I sent [some details](#!/osrf/gazebo/issue/985/compile-fails-on-gcc-482#comment-7410532) in issue #985.

This patch would break current compilation using ogre-1.8. I will resubmit this and other failures in a new pull request.
content.html:
I would say that it is not really or not only a problem of gcc 4.8.2 but a change in ogre 1.9. I sent some details in issue #985.

This patch would break current compilation using ogre-1.8. I will resubmit this and other failures in a new pull request.

content.raw: I believe that we could decline this in favour of pull request #883. @codebot right?

content.raw: it's strange, I just asked gmail to stop forwarding my osrf email to a different address, and all of the sudden I am getting watch emails from pull requests, which I never received before. Sorry for the silence. Yes, #883 is much better than this one. I did this pull request mostly so that I wouldn't forget the issue and the workaround. #883 actually does ifdefs and other nice things, so it is much better.

Sorry for the silence. Yes, #883 is much better than this one. I did this pull request mostly so that I wouldn't forget the issue and the workaround. #883 actually does ifdefs and other nice things, so it is much better.
